summary: The New York Post (NY Post) is an American daily newspaper founded in 1801 by Alexander Hamilton. It started as a respected broadsheet but changed to a tabloid format in the mid-20th century. The Post is known for its conservative views and has three online sites: NYPost.com, PageSix.com for gossip, and Decider.com for entertainment. Rupert Murdoch's News Corp bought it in 1976. Today, it's the eighth-largest newspaper in the U.S. by print circulation.
title: New York Post
